title: The Gallery
description: The Gallery is an interactive 3D model showcase tool, drag and drop your models and materials into the easy to use Blueprint. adjust your lighting, Package and send to clients.
longDescription:
Preview: youtu.be/0E5cDT-t77g

The Gallery is an interactive 3D model showcase tool, drag and drop your models and materials into the easy to use Blueprint. adjust your lighting, Package and send to clients.

Once you have gone through the easy setup process you will be able to explore your models in the gallery in first person, in free flight and in a lock on camera which centers your selected model in the viewport. You will be able to adjust the lighting of each individual model and the time of day so that you can see your models in multiple lighting scenarios. You can also instantly switch between different sets of materials applied to each model.

Customizable options allow you to change:
the orientation and scale of your models
The colour and number of the top and bottom lights surrounding your models
The materials applied to your models.

The project has been built entirely created through blueprints which could be transferable to other projects.
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints:28

Features:
• Model placement blueprint
• Auto base plate generation
• Auto floor light placement
• Auto top light placement
• Model transform adjustment
• Floor light colour adjustment
• Floor light spacing and orientation adjustment
• Top light colour adjustment
• Top light spacing and orientation adjustment
• Top light random seed adjustment for generating new placements of lights.
• Base plate mesh replacement option
• Baseplate transform options
• Day night cycle
• Time of day speed manipulation at runtime
• Auto light activation option when it gets dark
• Specialized music system
• Camera zoom
• First person exploration
• Free flight exploration
• Model lock on camera
• Dynamic lighting from fireplace
• Options menu
• Opening cinematic
• Simple music editing options via sound cue’s
• Start screen
• Pause screen
• Intractable element highlight and hud indicators
• Runtime tutorial prompts
• Customizable credits screen
• Material switching system with customizable icons

Intended Platform: Windows platforms
Platforms Tested: Windows 10 PC
Documentation Included: No
Important\Additional Notes: This package is designed to be both a stand-alone tool for 3D artists to use in conjunction with UE4 and a set of blueprints that can be used in other projects. As such, the blueprints are commented and labeled clearly.
